message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, then we can negotiate from there.
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away the farm!
You're not giving away the farm, but I'm not getting taken for a ride either!
I'm getting desperate, but I'm still not giving you the majority!
We're getting close, don't be shy, let's meet in the middle
